metas.name: Boku no Hero Academia THE MOVIE: YOU'RE NEXT
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi Tags:Male Protagonist/Superhero/Super Power/Shounen/Tsundere The fourth installment in the Boku no Hero Academia movie franchise.

metas.name: Look Back
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Slice of Life Tags:Drawing/Female Protagonist/Coming of Age/Primarily Female Cast/Shounen Ayumu Fujino is a fourth grader who draws a manga strip for the school newspaper. Her art makes her the star of the class, but one day she's told that Kyomoto, a student who refuses to come to school, would also like to submit a manga for the paper...

(Source: MANGA Plus, edited)

metas.name: Mononoke Movie
metas.description: Genres: Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Psychological, Supernatural Tags: Announced at the Mononoke 15th Anniversary Festival.

metas.name: Bocchi the Rock! Re:Re:
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Music, Slice of Life Tags:Band/Female Protagonist Compilation film of Bocchi the Rock! The second of the Bocchi compilation movie duology.

metas.name: Kimi no Iro
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags: Totsuko is a high-school student who attends a Christian Academy in Nagasaki and can see the hearts of people as colors. Whether they’re happy colors, sad colors, peaceful colors, frightened colors... In order to not darken her friend's and family's “colors,” Totsuko is careful to read the room and stretches the truth to keep them all brightly colored. Totsuko then meets a beautiful girl who radiates very striking colors and a boy who loves music in a used bookstore in the corner of town. The three come together and form a band to make the music of their adolescence.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

metas.name: MAKE A GIRL
metas.description:
Genres: Romance Tags: The story is centered around the main character, Akira, and his scientifically created girlfriend, No. 0.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai: Kanketsu-hen 1
metas.description: Genres: Music, Slice of Life Tags:Primarily Female Cast/Idol The first in a trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

metas.name: Suu-funkan no Yell wo
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags: The film's story begins when a high schooler who makes music videos meets a teacher who has given up on music. Amateur music video creator Kanata Asaya sees teacher and musician Yuu Orie busking on the street, and decides to make a music video of her music.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

metas.name: Zegapain STA
metas.description: Genres: Action, Mecha, Romance, Sci-Fi Tags: Sequel to the 2006 Zegapain TV series as part of "Zegapain PROJECT REUNION". The new sequel installment has the subtitle "Olta Moda Arc", named after the brand new force in the Zegapain universe "Olta Moda".

metas.name: Ghost Cat Anzu
metas.description:
Genres: Supernatural
Tags:
Karin, 11 years old, is abandoned by her father at her grandfather’s house, the monk of a small town in the Japanese countryside. Her grandfather asks Anzu, his jovial and helpful although rather capricious ghost cat, to look after her. The meeting of their strong characters causes sparks, at least at the beginning…

metas.name: Crayon Shin-chan: Ora-tachi no Kyouryuu Nikki
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Slice of Life Tags:Kids/Dinosaurs The 32nd Crayon Shin-chan film. The movie will follow the friendship between the Nobara family's pet dog Shiro and a "small dinosaur." Their connection helps the growth of Shinnosuke and the Kusakabe Defense Squad.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

metas.name: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Baikinman to Ehon no Lulun
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Kids The film's story centers on Anpanman's nemesis Baikinman, but this time, he attempts to become a warrior of love and courage when he is sucked into a picture book. Inside the book is a large forest where fairies live. Baikinman meets the fairy Lulun, who asks him to defeat an elephant that is rampaging in the forest. Although Baikinman is reluctant, he tries his best to defeat the elephant. However, it is too strong for Baikinman, so he tells Lulun to call Anpanman to help protect the picture book world.

(Source: Anime News Network)
